MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK9 postcode area of Causewayhead. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am to complete repair work at Craigmill and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07:20am on 27th January 2021.
